definition.p: Test case content consists of the test scripts for the products and foundations of the FieldWorks suite of programs. Each product's test scripts are kept in a subdirectory of the TS directory.

ul.name: Each product subdirectory contains a library of test scripts
ul.li: folder-name.xml - top level XML list for the testscript files belonging to the library
*.htm - javascript in HTML that shows the list view of all testscripts in the library for validation
TestListGen.bat - A batch file that generates TestList.htm the title page for each library.
BugPatGen.bat - A batch file that generates the list of possible bugs (PatList.htm) for each library.

definition.p: A testscript file from one library is considered part of another library if it is associated by name in the other library's folder-name.xml file. That is, the testscript is "shared" by the other library.
